did.head: Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of Finance and Administration..

did.unittitle: General Accounting Services, Yale University, monthly accounting statements
did.abstract: The materials consist of microfiche copies of monthly accounting statements from General Accounting Services.

note.label: Note:
note.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 5-B (YRG 5-B), Accounting records and records of the Yale comptroller.

acqinfo.p: The materials were transferred from General Accounting Services, 2008.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

userestrict.head: Ownership Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: General Accounting Services, Yale University, Monthly Accounting Statements (RU 1091). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Notes
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

bioghist.head: Information about the Creator(s)
bioghist.p: General Accounting Operations Development is responsible for overseeing Labor Distribution, Grants Management, and Accounts Receivable, in addition to the General Ledger. The department is also responsible for establishing processes to ensure the proper integration of accounting. Additional responsibilities of GA Services include: establish the University's accounting calendar and oversee posting/closing activities; develop reconciliation processes/procedures that ensure effective integration of financial transactions; maintain COA values including PSOO and PTAEO; establish electronic transaction processing standards; and design quality assurance programs.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Papers
scopecontent.p: The materials consist of microfiche copies of monthly accounting statements from General Accounting Services.
